text: Anthology was a greatest hits album by Selena. The album included remixed songs from Selena's early music career. Two EPs were released as a promotion. The album sold over 1,200,000 copies. ==Track listing== #Always Mine #No Quiero Saber #Don't Throw Away My Love #La Bamba #I'm Getting Used To You (club remix) #Yo Fui Aquella #Captive Heart #Amame #Missing My Baby #Disco Medley (Full; Club Remix) Mariachi #Ramalazo #Dame Tu Amor #Pa'Que Me Sirve La Vida #Differentes #Siempre Hace Frio #Que Creias #Quiero Estar Contigo #Rama Caida #Sabes #Tu Solo Tu Cumbia #Yo Te Dare #La Puerta Se Cerro #Corazoncito #Enamorada de Ti #No Debes Jugar #Carino Mio #Salta La Ranita #Te Amo Solo A Ti #La Llamada #Baila Esta Cumbia ==Promotional singles== Two EPs were released. Both of them contained five songs each. == Critical reception == ==Sales and certifications== Notes Note that RIAA has launched its Oro y De Platino certification scheme for those albums the 50% of the content of which are in Spanish, initially, the award-levels for Oro y De Platino were: Gold=100,000 and Platinum=200,000. In February 2008, RIAA reduced the certification-award-levels for Oro y De Platino to Gold=50,000 and Platinum=100,000. Country Certification Sales USA 6x Platinum (Certification type: Latin) 1,200,000+ ==References== Category:1998 albums Category:Selena albums Category:Greatest hits albums
title: Anthology (Selena album)
